## Check phychem delivery

This is an R Markdown document that checks physical and chemical data that has been delivered to the datahost.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.

## Load library and data

```{r loadlibdata, echo=FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(SHARK4R)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
setwd("C:/__R/_test_SHARK4R/")
# myfile = shark_read_deliv("Hallands kustkontroll kvartal 2_2020.xlsx") # The good
myfile = shark_read_deliv_xls("rptSMHI_2012-2017_mol.xls", skip=0) # The bad
```

## Overview of data

```{r overview, echo=FALSE}
glimpse(myfile)
DT::datatable(myfile)
```

## Check fields

Uses the check_fields() function to control if all required fields are present.

```{r checkfields, echo = FALSE}
check_deliv_PhysicalChemical(myfile)
```
